attributes.action: address the social and cultural barriers that a diagnosis of schizophrenia imposes on the an individual labelled with this disorder.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned want to abolish the diagnosis of schizophrenia on the grounds that it is outdated, unscientific and stigmatising, presenting as a barrier to effective and appropriate care/support to the individuals diagnosed with this label.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " address the social and cultural barriers that a diagnosis of schizophrenia imposes on the an individual labelled with this disorder."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page23049


Prime Minister's Office
